00019 
00020 #ifndef __surfit_solver_sor__
00021 #define __surfit_solver_sor__
00022 
00023 #include <algorithm>
00024 #include <vector>
00025 
00026 #include <errno.h>
00027 
00028 #include "vec.h"
00029 #include "vec_alg.h"
00030 
00031 #include <float.h>
00032 
00033 using namespace std;
00034 
00035 namespace surfit {
00036 
00037 template <class M, class V>
00038 vec * sor(M * A, V * b, int max_it, REAL tol, vec *& X, REAL omega = REAL(1.6), REAL undef_value = FLT_MAX) {
00039         int flag = 0;                                // initialization
00040         int iter = 0;
00041         
00042         REAL bnrm2 = norm2( b );
00043         if  ( bnrm2 == REAL(0) )
00044                 bnrm2 = REAL(1); 
00045 
00046         vec * r = new vec(b->size());
00047         
00048         vec * x = NULL;
00049         if (!X) {
00050                 x = new vec(b->size());
00051                 int cnt;
00052                 for (cnt = 0; cnt < b->size(); cnt++) {
00053                         (*x)(cnt) = (*b)(cnt);
00054                 };
00055         }
00056         else 
00057         {
00058                 x = X;
00059                 X = NULL;
00060         }
00061 
00062         REAL error = FLT_MAX;
00063         REAL error_norm = bnrm2;        
00064         REAL sigma = 0;
00065         int i,j,prev_j;
00066 
00067         int n = b->size();
00068         REAL a_ii;
00069 
00070         vec * x_1 = new vec(*x);
00071 
00072         for (iter = 0; iter < max_it; iter++) {
00073 
00074                 for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00075                         
00076                         a_ii = A->at(i,i);
00077                         if (a_ii == REAL(0)) 
00078                                 continue;
00079 
00080                         sigma = 0;
00081                         
00082                         for (j = 0; j < i;) {
00083                                 prev_j = j;
00084                                 sigma += (*x)(prev_j)*A->at(i,j,&j);
00085                         }
00086                         
00087                         for (j = i+1; j < n;) {
00088                                 prev_j = j;
00089                                 sigma += (*x_1)(prev_j)*A->at(i,j,&j);
00090                         }
00091                         
00092                         sigma = ( (*b)(i) - sigma )/a_ii;
00093                         
00094                         (*x)(i) = (*x_1)(i) + omega*( sigma - (*x_1)(i) );
00095 
00096                 }
00097                 
00098                 error = 0;
00099                 for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00100                         error += ((*x)(i) - (*x_1)(i))*((*x)(i) - (*x_1)(i));
00101                 }
00102                 error /= error_norm;
00103                 if (error < tol)
00104                         break;
00105                 
00106                 *x_1 = *x;
00107 
00108         }
00109 
00110         delete x_1;
00111 
00112         writelog(SURFIT_MESSAGE,"sor: (%d)\terror : %12.6G iter : %d",x->size(), error, iter);
00113 
00114         return x;
00115         
00116 };
00117 
00118 }; // namespace surfit;
00119 
00120 #endif 
00121
